name: Memory Harvester Kythara
prompt: Portrait of Kythara, void-touched archivist, 30s, pallid skin with starfleck freckles, black vellum robes etched with thin silver runes, iridescent data-vials at belt, library of chained tomes background, cool violet underlight, surreal realism, 1:1, 2048x2048
alt_text: A pallid archivist with star-like freckles among chained tomes under violet light.
